languages.text: "Я бы не советовал даже думать об этом. Несанкционированные псайкеры — врата для сил {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g}, как бы ни утверждали обратное менее искушенные в этом вопросе личности".

traits.locale_text: "Я настоятельно советую воздержаться от подобных крайних мер, {name}". {n}Хейнрикс окидывает вас стальным взглядом, недвусмысленно потирая двумя пальцами розетту.{/n}

languages.text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."
languages.original_text: "Я бы не советовал даже думать об этом. Несанкционированные псайкеры — врата для сил {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g}, как бы ни утверждали обратное менее искушенные в этом вопросе личности".

traits.locale_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned Astropaths are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy's{/g} forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"If events take a truly deplorable turn, I am afraid that will be the only available way to replenish the choir. And unsanctioned astropaths are gateways for the Archenemy's forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned Astropaths are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"If events take a truly deplorable turn, I am afraid that will be the only available way to replenish the choir. And unsanctioned astropaths are gateways for the Archenemy's forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned Astropaths are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy's{/g} forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned Astropaths are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

"I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

languages.text: «Le recomiendo que ni siquiera se plantee esa opción. Los psíquicos no autorizados son portales para las fuerzas del {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archienemigo{/g}, por más que los ignorantes insistan en lo contrario».
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

traits.locale_text: «Le recomiendo que ni siquiera se plantee esa opción. Los psíquicos no autorizados son portales para las fuerzas del {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archienemigo{/g}, por más que los ignorantes insistan en lo contrario».

«Si la situación se tuerce por completo, me temo que esa será la única forma realista de reponer a los miembros del Coro. Y los Astrópatas no autorizados son portales para las fuerzas del Archienemigo, por más que los ignorantes insistan en lo contrario».

languages.text: 「そのような選択肢は、そもそも考えることすらおすすめいたしません。非公認の異能者は、{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}渾沌の勢力{/g}の軍勢の進入路です。この問題にあまり詳しくない者たちは、逆の主張をしておりますがね」
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

traits.locale_text: 「そのような選択肢は、そもそも考えることすらおすすめいたしません。非公認の異能者は、{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}渾沌の勢力{/g}の軍勢の進入路です。この問題にあまり詳しくない者たちは、逆の主張をしておりますがね」
「事態が極めてよくない方向に向かえば、聖歌隊を補充する方法はそれしかないだろう。非公認の感応通信官が懐にいれば、この問題に関する知識の乏しい者達は反対意見として、それが渾沌の勢力の出入り口となると主張する」

languages.text: “这种事情，我建议你根本连考虑都不要考虑。非法灵能者相当于{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的门户，不过，那些对这个问题不太了解的人往往会提出相反的见解。”
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

traits.locale_text: “这种事情，我建议你根本连考虑都不要考虑。非法灵能者相当于{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的门户，不过，那些对这个问题不太了解的人往往会提出相反的见解。”
“如果事态的发展很不顺利，雇佣非法灵能者恐怕会是补充星语者的唯一手段。非法灵能者相当于{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的门户，但那些对这个问题不太了解的人往往会提出相反的看法。”

languages.text: "Ich würde davon abraten, eine solche Option auch nur in Erwägung zu ziehen. Unsanktionierte Psioniker sind Portale für die Heerscharen des {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeind{/g}es, und jeder, der das Gegenteil behauptet, hat keine Ahnung."
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde davon abraten, eine solche Option auch nur in Erwägung zu ziehen. Unsanktionierte Psioniker sind Portale für die Heerscharen des {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeind{/g}es, und jeder, der das Gegenteil behauptet, hat keine Ahnung."

"Sollte es zum Schlimmsten kommen, so fürchte ich, dass ich die einzige Möglichkeit bin, den Chor wieder aufzufüllen. Und unsanktionierte Astropathen sind ein Portal für die Truppen des Erzfeindes, auch wenn Laien, die nichts von der Materie verstehen, noch so oft das Gegenteil behaupten."

languages.text: « À votre place, je n'y songerais même pas. Les psykers non assermentés sont de véritables portes d'entrée pour les forces du {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Grand Ennemi{/g}, quoi qu'en disent les non-initiés. »
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, je n'y songerais même pas. Les psykers non assermentés sont de véritables portes d'entrée pour les forces du {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Grand Ennemi{/g}, quoi qu'en disent les non-initiés. »

« Si les choses devaient dégénérer, j'ai bien peur que ce soit le seul moyen de reconstituer le chœur. Or, les astropathes non assermentés sont de véritables portes d'entrée pour les forces du Grand Ennemi, quoi qu'en disent les non-initiés. »

languages.text: "Bunu bir seçenek olarak bile görmeni tavsiye etmiyorum. Onaysız ruhsezerler, {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} kuvvetleri için geçit görevi görür. Aksini iddia eden varsayımlar, bu hususta daha az bilgi sahibi olanlar tarafından yapılmıştır."
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend even considering such an option. Unsanctioned psykers are gateways for the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces, for all the claims to the contrary made by those less knowledgeable on the issue."
